sentences.sentence: Illogically she had expected some kind of miracle solution.
sentences.translation: 她本以为会有奇迹般的解决方法，这是不合情理的事。

sentences.sentence: Illogically, she had expected some kind of miracle solution.
sentences.translation: 她满以为会有奇迹般的解决办法，这显然不合情理。

sentences.sentence: Illogically, IT have to HAs expected some kind of miracle solution.
sentences.translation: 她竟期望会有某种奇迹般的解决办法，这是不合情理的事。
